elements.name: Anweisung
elements.title: Answer the questions on the subject of concentration.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the difference between cooperation and concentration?
elements.correctAnswer: Cooperation is a corporate collaboration between independent companies, which can take place either at the same level or at different levels of the commercial chain. Concentration, on the other hand, represents a (financial) business combination.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Explain the difference between a merger and a takeover.
elements.correctAnswer: In a merger, two companies of approximately equal strength merge into one company. Normally, a new joint company name is created. In a takeover, a financially strong company buys a smaller company, which usually retains its name.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What do you mean by a holding company?
elements.correctAnswer: A holding company is an umbrella or financing company that does not conduct business itself. It merely manages the companies belonging to it.
